dsc-DeloitteAIA-021224-A 📉📊📈 -  Big Data Intro ☁️ 💻

This data introduces concepts fundamental to cloud computing and the way it operates at the enterprise level. At the highest of noon, in a desert seemingly unbound by space and time, in its last moment under an ardent sun, a single cloud is witness to the arrival of a multitude of others. A torrent lasting 1000 years gradually changes the landscape into a lush garden. There, after a long while, this repo was found... it was sourced with ❤️ Flatiron School.
